title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2827/93 of 15 October 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 936/93 as regards the special temporary allowance for the transport of certain fresh fruit and vegetables originating in Greece
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2827/93 of 15 October 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 936/93 as regards the special temporary allowance for the transport of certain fresh fruit and vegetables originating in Greece
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The figure of 'ECU 2,3' referred to in Article 1 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 936/93 is hereby replaced by 'ECU 4'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply to consignments dispatched from 1 October 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 October 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
